data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Apameini (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from Sichuan (China)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gyulai, Peter, Saldaitis, Aidas, Zilli, Alberto (2019): A new genus and species of Apameini (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from Sichuan (China). Zootaxa 4545 (4): 593-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.4.10
